# Paula’s Choice – Skin-Concern Library

> LLM-ready copies of our concern pages.  Each link points to the cleaned Markdown mirror under `/docs/`.

## Skin-concern pages
- [Overview cards](docs/by-skin-concern/index.html.md): Thumbnail list of all concerns
- [Acne-prone skin](docs/by-skin-concern/acne-prone-skin.html.md)
- [Breakouts](docs/by-skin-concern/breakouts.html.md)
- [Blackheads](docs/by-skin-concern/blackheads.html.md)
- [Anti-Ageing](docs/by-skin-concern/anti-ageing.html.md)
- [Dull skin](docs/by-skin-concern/dull-skin.html.md)
- [Keratosis pilaris](docs/by-skin-concern/keratosis-pilaris.html.md)
- [Brown spots](docs/by-skin-concern/brown-spots.html.md)
- [Redness](docs/by-skin-concern/redness.html.md)
- [Enlarged pores](docs/by-skin-concern/enlarged-pores.html.md)
- [Rosacea-prone skin](docs/by-skin-concern/rosacea-prone-skin.html.md)
